title: PM Modi to inaugurate new ASI building
article_body: NEW DELHI: PMwill inaugurate the new building of the Archaeological Survey of India on Thursday and take a walk inside ASI’s treasure trove— the newly-fitted.A repository of rare archaeological, cultural and religious records, sources saidwill be taken on a tour of the library. Among the prized collections housed within the library are Kautilya’s Arthasharta, and original and rare books on inscriptions like Kharosti and Brahmi. Government sources said the library contains about 1.5 lakh books and about 5,000 preserved and 10,000 unpreserved original manuscripts.
